db:abstract.db:para: The QRenderCapabilities class holds settings related to available rendering engines.

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: RenderCapabilities provides details of graphical features that are available at runtime. It can be used to decide which code path to use for some algorithms, for example, depending on whether compute shaders are available or not.

db:section.db:title: [read-only] api : QRenderCapabilities::API
db:section.db:para: Returns which API is currently in use.

db:section.db:title: [read-only] driverVersion : string
db:section.db:para: Returns the driver version string.

db:section.db:title: [read-only] extensions : list<string>
db:section.db:para: Returns the list of extensions currently available.

db:section.db:title: [read-only] glslVersion : string
db:section.db:para: Returns the GLSL version string.

db:section.db:title: [read-only] majorVersion : int
db:section.db:para: Returns the major version number currently in use.

db:section.db:title: [read-only] maxComputeInvocations : int
db:section.db:para: Returns the maximum number of Compute Shaders available.

db:section.db:title: [read-only] maxComputeSharedMemorySize : int
db:section.db:para: Returns the maximum amount of shared memory available for Compute Shaders.

db:section.db:title: [read-only] maxImageUnits : int
db:section.db:para: Returns the maximum number of available image units.

db:section.db:title: [read-only] maxSSBOBindings : int
db:section.db:para: Returns the maximum number of available SSBO binding points, if supported.

db:section.db:title: [read-only] maxSSBOSize : int
db:section.db:para: Returns the maximum size of SSBOs, if available.

db:section.db:title: [read-only] maxSamples : int
db:section.db:para: Returns the maximum number of samples available for MSAA.

db:section.db:title: [read-only] maxTextureLayers : int
db:section.db:para: Returns the number of available texture layers.

db:section.db:title: [read-only] maxTextureSize : int
db:section.db:para: Returns the maximum size of textures.

db:section.db:title: [read-only] maxTextureUnits : int
db:section.db:para: Returns the number of available texture units.

db:section.db:title: [read-only] maxUBOBindings : int
db:section.db:para: Returns the maximum number of available UBO binding points, if supported.

db:section.db:title: [read-only] maxUBOSize : int
db:section.db:para: Returns the maximum size of UBOs, if supported.

db:section.db:title: [read-only] maxWorkGroupCountX : int
db:section.db:para: Returns the maximum number of available Compute Shader workgroups in the X axis.

db:section.db:title: [read-only] maxWorkGroupCountY : int
db:section.db:para: Returns the maximum number of available Compute Shader workgroups in the Y axis.

db:section.db:title: [read-only] maxWorkGroupCountZ : int
db:section.db:para: Returns the maximum number of available Compute Shader workgroups in the Z axis.

db:section.db:title: [read-only] maxWorkGroupSizeX : int
db:section.db:para: Returns the maximum size of Compute Shader local workgroups in the X axis.

db:section.db:title: [read-only] maxWorkGroupSizeY : int
db:section.db:para: Returns the maximum size of Compute Shader local workgroups in the Y axis.

db:section.db:title: [read-only] maxWorkGroupSizeZ : int
db:section.db:para: Returns the maximum size of Compute Shader local workgroups in the Z axis.

db:section.db:title: [read-only] minorVersion : int
db:section.db:para: Returns the minor version number currently in use.

db:section.db:title: [read-only] profile : bool
db:section.db:para: Returns which profile (if applicable) is currently in use.

db:section.db:title: [read-only] renderer : string
db:section.db:para: Returns the device identification string.

db:section.db:title: [read-only] supportsCompute : bool
db:section.db:para: Returns true if Compute Shaders are supported.

db:section.db:title: [read-only] supportsImageStore : bool
db:section.db:para: Returns true if Image Store operations are supported.

db:section.db:title: [read-only] supportsSSBO : bool
db:section.db:para: Returns true if SSBOs are supported.

db:section.db:title: [read-only] supportsUBO : bool
db:section.db:para: Returns true if UBOs are supported.

db:section.db:title: [read-only] valid : bool
db:section.db:para: true if the data is valid, otherwise Qt 3D failed to query the available hardware.

db:section.db:title: [read-only] vendor : string
db:section.db:para: Returns the vendor identification string.
